The '''Zubayr Theater Billboard''' is a bulletin board located in the [[Grand Bazaar]] in [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]]. It is located in front of the ramp to the [[Zubayr Theater]].

==Content==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Interact with the {{DIcon}} Noticeboard)
:'''Zubayr Theater Billboard:''' Recent Performance Schedule: Regular Performance "The Merchant of Ormos" written by [[Sheikh Zubayr]].
:'''Zubayr Theater Billboard:''' Special Performance Tonight &mdash; The Legend of the Knight of Flowers. Leading actress: [[Nilou]].
:'''Zubayr Theater Billboard:''' More exciting performances scheduled this week! Come enjoy our amazing shows!
:'''Mahamata Announcement:''' This show has been approved by [[Sumeru Akademiya|the Akademiya]], but further improvements must be made in the allotted time before a second review to further reinforce the theme of 'Wisdom'.
{{Dialogue end}}
